content: the wes baby sweater is a simple drop shoulder baby sweater knit in false fisherman s rib with optional name embroidery the body is knit flat in separate pieces from the bottom up after seaming these together stitches are picked up for the sleeves and collar to be worked in the round the bottom hem is folded scrap yarn can be used for the chain stitch embroidery sizes 3 6 12 18 24 months finished body circumference 18 75 19 5 21 25 22 22 75 in / 47 49 53 55 57 cm yarn approximations fingering weight yarn 253 286 346 391 431 yards / 232 261 316 358 395 meters optional yarn for embroidery scraps in worsted weight gauge 20 st and 44 row per 4in x 4in/10cm x 10 cm in false fisherman s rib needles size us 3 3 25 mm
